message:
الناس العظيمة البتعمل GUI من غير drag & drop
دلوقتي الoverride method دي بتخلي الwindow يتحرك معايا من غير ما يكون الcursor علي الtitle bar
كل الفهمته بعد ما دورت ان الobject m بيتبعت فيها الevents البتحصل للwindow
و Msg بيبقي فيها الID بتاع الmessage البعتتها الoperating system
مش فاهم WM_NCHITTEST و HT_CAPTION و Result دول ايه هما او فيهم ايه
شكراً

data.message:
WM_NCHITTEST determines what part of the window corresponds to a particular screen coordinate :
https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/ms645618(v=vs.85).aspx

When you click or move the cursor across the form, WndProc receives a message m which has two main properties Msg and Result and both are get/set properties.

so you are checking if the window gets a message of mouse action, and the m.Result set will force the window to read the mouse cursor is moving or sending action on the title bar which is HT_CAPTION.
